title: "AI safety use cases - signing off on Financial Services’ ‘black box’"
excerpt: "Yes, there are stringent regulations that the banks are worried about. So, the use cases where they've adopted AI have, until now, been in places that auditors have scored as low risk. Areas like customer service, where they've used things like text analytics and simplistic AI. But now generative AI is coming into the picture."
